alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Grady (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:34PM CDT until July 08 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN GRADY...EAST CENTRAL CADDO AND SOUTHWESTERN CANADIAN COUNTIES... At 434 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Calumet, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... El Reno, Union City, Minco, Cogar and Cedar Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
